mapper.select: SELECT c.treat_no as treat_no , r.rcept_no as rcept_no , p.pat_name as pat_name , p.pat_code as pat_code , TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY') - SUBSTR(p.pat_brthdy,0,4) as pat_age , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(p.pat_brthdy),'YYYY-MM-DD') as pat_brthdy , c2.com_code_name as pat_gen , c1.com_code_name as pat_wait , c3.com_code_name as pat_path , c4.com_code_name as pat_first , c5.com_code_name as pat_day , c6.com_code_name as pat_hsptlz_status , e.emp_nm as emp_nm , hf.hos_fc_name as hos_fc_name ,d.detail_no , r.recept_time FROM tb_clinic c INNER JOIN tb_receipt r INNER JOIN tb_patient p INNER JOIN tb_common_code c2 ON p.pat_gen_code = c2.com_code AND c2.com_code_grp = 'GEND' ON r.pat_code = p.pat_code INNER JOIN tb_common_code c3 ON r.rcept_path_code = c3.com_code AND c3.com_code_grp = 'PVST' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c4 ON r.rcept_first_exam_code = c4.com_code AND c4.com_code_grp = 'FEXM' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c5 ON r.rcept_day_code = c5.com_code AND c5.com_code_grp = 'DAYN' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c6 on p.PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS = c6.com_code AND c6.com_code_grp = 'HSPT' ON c.rcept_no = r.rcept_no INNER JOIN tb_clinic_schedule cs INNER JOIN tb_hospital_facility hf ON hf.HOS_FC_NO = cs.HOS_FC_NO INNER JOIN tb_employee e ON e.emp_no = cs.emp_no ON r.schd_no = cs.schd_no INNER JOIN tb_common_code c1 ON c.clnic_sttus_code = c1.com_code AND c1.com_code_grp = 'STAT' INNER JOIN tb_chart_detail d ON d.TREAT_NO = c.TREAT_NO WHERE c.clnic_sttus_code = 'INWT' OR c.clnic_sttus_code = 'IING'

SELECT P.PAT_CODE , P.PAT_NAME , P.PAT_TEL , P.PAT_IHIDNUM , to_char(to_date(PAT_BRTHDY),'yyyy-mm-dd') as PAT_BRTHDY, (SELECT C1.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_PATIENT P1, TB_COMMON_CODE C1 WHERE P1.PAT_GEN_CODE = C1.COM_CODE AND P1.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND C1.COM_CODE_GRP = 'GEND') AS PAT_GEN_CODE , P.PAT_ADDR , P.PAT_DTL_ADDR, P.PAT_ZIP, to_char(PAT_FIRST_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS PAT_FIRST_DATE, to_char(PAT_LAST_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS PAT_LAST_DATE , (SELECT C3.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_PATIENT P3, TB_COMMON_CODE C3 WHERE P3.PAT_FRGNR_YN = C3.COM_CODE AND P3.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND C3.COM_CODE_GRP = 'YSNO') AS PAT_FRGNR_YN , (SELECT C2.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_PATIENT P2, TB_COMMON_CODE C2 WHERE P2.PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS = C2.COM_CODE AND P2.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND C2.COM_CODE_GRP = 'HSPT') AS PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS FROM TB_PATIENT P WHERE PAT_CODE = #{patCode}

SELECT CD.DETAIL_NO, I.INSPC_CODE, I.INSPC_TYPE, IL.INSPC_MEMO FROM TB_INSPECTION_LIST IL INNER JOIN TB_CHART_DETAIL CD ON CD.DETAIL_NO = IL.DETAIL_NO INNER JOIN TB_INSPECTION I ON I.INSPC_CODE = IL.INSPC_CODE INNER JOIN TB_CLINIC C ON C.TREAT_NO = CD.TREAT_NO WHERE CD.TREAT_NO = #{treatNo} AND CD.DETAIL_NO= #{detailNo}

SELECT IL.DETAIL_NO, I.INSPC_TYPE, I.INSPC_CODE, IL.INSPC_DATE, F.FILE_NAME, F.FILE_WEB_PATH FROM TB_INSPECTION_LIST IL INNER JOIN TB_INSPECTION I ON I.INSPC_CODE = IL.INSPC_CODE INNER JOIN TB_ATTACH_FILE F on F.FILE_CODE = IL.DETAIL_NO || IL.INSPC_CODE WHERE IL.DETAIL_NO=#{detailNo}
mapper.update: update TB_CLINIC cl set cl.CLNIC_STTUS_CODE = 'IING' where cl.TREAT_NO =#{treatNo} and EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_CHART_DETAIL cd INNER JOIN TB_INSPECTION_LIST il on cd.DETAIL_NO = il.DETAIL_NO where cd.TREAT_NO = cl.TREAT_NO)

update TB_CLINIC cl set cl.CLNIC_STTUS_CODE = 'IEND' where cl.TREAT_NO =#{treatNo} and EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_CHART_DETAIL cd INNER JOIN TB_INSPECTION_LIST il on cd.DETAIL_NO = il.DETAIL_NO where cd.TREAT_NO = cl.TREAT_NO)
